⚠️ SECURITY NOTICE: Educational and Research Use Only

All tools and scripts provided are for educational, research, and authorized testing purposes only.

Use responsibly. Obtain proper authorization before deployment in production environments.

By downloading, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

root@bytebox:~$ cat INSTALLATION.md

// Installation & Usage //

1.
Download payload: wget https://byte-box.org/payloads/[filename]
2.
Make executable: chmod +x [filename]
3.
Review source code: cat [filename] | less
4.
Execute safely: ./[filename] --help

⚠️ Always review code before execution

⚠️ Test in isolated environments first

⚠️ Ensure you have proper authorization
